title: banned by duo trolls
body:
The renekton and his duos were spamming in all chat saying i was calling him the n word and telling him to kill himself. as you can see in my chat logs i did not say anything toxic but got banned. score one for team trolls..

Game 3
ShroomPlugTeemo: report ryze
ShroomPlugTeemo: i see no support
ShroomPlugTeemo: and i called mid
ShroomPlugTeemo: muted
ShroomPlugTeemo: muted
ShroomPlugTeemo: im recording the chat lol
ShroomPlugTeemo: w/e u say
ShroomPlugTeemo: ez
ShroomPlugTeemo: renk the only reason i havent muted you is cus im getting you banned
ShroomPlugTeemo: just adding more fuel to your fire
ShroomPlugTeemo: i hope u didnt pay for that skin lol
ShroomPlugTeemo: gg

replies.body: As there is a previous thread by the same poster discussing his/her chat logs (accessible [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/6MhAasZQ-bully-victim-banned-by-trolls-abusing-automated-feedback-system), including the games omitted here and several in-depth discussions of the behaviors displayed) I will be locking this thread. Please direct any discussion to the aforementioned thread.

oh he posted them in another thread.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/6MhAasZQ-bully-victim-banned-by-trolls-abusing-automated-feedback-system

not sure what he's trying to do with this one.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O96aEKQN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-19T21:12:11.503+0000)
>
> What about games 1 and 2?

I retract my statement, Tantrum the detective

Hmmm... Did you have any previous bans before this? Because this chat does have a good amount of general negativity, as well as calling for reports which, even if they were trolling, is generally prohibited, but I can't see this resulting in any more than a chat restrict unless you have gotten a chat restrict or 2 before this.

I'd send a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see what they have to say.

He already has a [previous post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/6MhAasZQ-bully-victim-banned-by-trolls-abusing-automated-feedback-system) discussing not only this chat log, but the other two chat logs alongside them.

ShroomPlugTeemo: renk the only reason i havent muted you is cus im getting you banned

Genius
